name: John Doe
role: Senior Software Engineer / AI Systems Architect
summary: Senior Software Engineer with over 9 years of experience in building cloud-native AI platforms, large-scale distributed systems, and intelligent automation solutions. Skilled in integrating LLMs, ML models, and microservice architectures to deliver scalable, high-performance enterprise systems. Passionate about bridging technology and business strategy to create meaningful impact.

experiences.detail: Engineered cloud-native AI platforms integrating multi-agent LLM systems and RAG pipelines to automate complex compliance workflows and data intelligence processes.
Developed AI-driven conversational systems and scalable inference pipelines achieving sub-second latency and 99.98% uptime across distributed microservices.
Led backend and infrastructure development for high-performance network security platforms handling up to 40 Gbps, with automated CI/CD and observability pipelines.

education.grade: Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in Computer Software Engineering
